Translations.Text: Ta jiushi ren liang hai ziyou jiaoliu de, zhe shi hen tian de danshui, na shi hen ku de xianshui; ta zai liang hai zhi jian shezhi pingzhang he difang.
Ta jiushi yong jing shui chuangzao ren, shi ren chengwei xuezu he yinqin de. Ni de zhu shi quanneng de.
Tamen she zhenzhu er chongbai naxie dui tamen ji wu fu you wu huo de dongxi, bu xindao zhe shi xiezhu taren yi fankang ziji de zhu de.
Wo zhi paiqian ni wei baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe.
Ni shuo:`Wo duiyu wancheng zhe xiang shiming, bu xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou, dan wang youzhi zhe neng you ci dadao er dadao qi zhuzai.'
Ni yingdang xinren yongsheng bumie de zhu, ni yingdang zansong ta chaojue wanwu. Ta zuyi che zhi ta de zuiguo.
Zai liu rinei chuangzao tiandi wanwu, ranhou sheng shang baozuo de, shi zhiren zhu. Ni yingdang yi ta (de de xing) qingjiao jingming zhe.
Ruguo youren dui tamen shuo:`Nimen yingdang wei zhiren zhu er koutou.'Tamen jiu shuo:`Zhiren zhu shi shenme? Nandao women yin feng ni de mingling er koutou ma?'Na shi tamen gengjia fangan.â€»
Shengjie zai zhenzhu! Ta ba xuduo gong zao zai tianshang, youzao mingdeng he canlan de yueliang.
Ta jiushi wei yu juewu huo yu ganxie zhe, er shi zhouye gengdie de.
Zhiren zhu de pu ren shi zai dadishang qianxun er xing de; dang yuren yi e yan shanghai tamen de shihou, tamen shuo:`Zhu nimen ping'an.'
Tamen wei tamen de zhu er tongxiao koutou he suli;
tamen chang shuo:`Women de zhu a! Qiu ni wei women bi kai huo yu de xingfa. Huo yu de xingfa que shi ling ren feichang tongku de,
que shi elie de zhuchu he jusuo.'
Tamen yong qian de shihou, ji bu huihuo, you bu linse, jin shou zhong dao;
tamen zhi qidao zhenzhu, bu qidao bie de shenling; tamen bu weibei zhenzhu de jinling er sharen, chufei youyu changming; tamen ye bu tongjian. Shui fan ci lei (zui'e), shui zao chengfa;
fuhuo ri yao shou jiabei de xingfa, er shouru de yong ju qizhong.
Wei huiguo erqie xindao bingxingshangong zhe, zhenzhu jiang gouxiao qi zuixing, er luqu qi shangong. Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.
Huiguo erqie xing shan zhe, que yi zhuanxiang zhenzhu.
Tamen bu zuo jia jianzheng, tamen tingdao e yan de shihou qianxun de zou kai.
Youren yi tamen de zhu de jixiang quan jie tamen de shihou, tingjiang zhe bing bu zhuang long zuo xia de zai dahan.
Tamen shuo:`Women de zhu a! Qiu ni yi women de qi zi er nu wei women de anwei, qiu ni yi women wei jingwei zhe de dianfan.'
Zhe deng ren neng jianren, yinci jiang shou gaoji de baochou, tamen zai leyuan li, jiang tingjian zhushou he zhu an.
Tamen jiang yong ju qizhong. Leyuan shi youmei de zhuchu he jusuo.
Ni shuo:`Jiaruo meiyou nimen de qidao, wo de zhu bing bu guanqie nimen, dan nimen ji yi fouren zhenli, nimen jianglai yao shou wufa jietuo de xingfa.'
